description:
You Have an Awesome Book for Sale on Amazon…SO WHAT?

You have a book. You have a title. You have a killer description. You have a stunning cover.

BUT — what you don’t have is readers.

Unless your book just sucks, there is usually ONE reason why no one is buying it.

There is a good chance no one even knows it exists, but the real issue is that it has ZERO reviews on Amazon.

The truth is, great books are published every day that never sell and go unnoticed because no one has vouched for them. Would you buy a book by an author you had never heard of in your life and who didn’t have a single review for their book?!

I didn’t thinks so…
title: How to Get Book Reviews for Kindle Authors
